General.Name: Shanghai Universal Biotech Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Shanghai Universal Biotech Co.,Ltd distributes and supplies antibodies and protein products. It offers antibodies, recombinant proteins, detection kits, antigens, paired antibodies, and other products, as well as immunological reagents, molecular biology reagents, and cell biology reagents; and technical training and software solutions. It also sells products online. The company serves colleges and universities, scientific research institutes, hospitals and biopharmaceutical enterprises, etc. Shanghai Universal Biotech Co.,Ltd was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
